CustomField.formula: IF((IF(INCLUDES(Assistance_Request__c,"Business Planning"),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Assistance_Request__c,"Business Registration"),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Assistance_Request__c,"Financing"),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Assistance_Request__c,"Financials/Accounting"),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Assistance_Request__c,"Government Information"),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Assistance_Request__c,"Import / Export"),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Assistance_Request__c,"Intellectual Property"),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Assistance_Request__c,"Market Research"),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Assistance_Request__c,"Marketing"),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Assistance_Request__c,"Insurance"),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Assistance_Request__c,"Real Estate"),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Assistance_Request__c,"Mentoring"),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Assistance_Request__c,"Referral"),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Assistance_Request__c,"Startup - General Info"),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Assistance_Request__c,"Legal - General"),1,0))>1,"Consultation","Walk-In")
CustomField.label: Service Requested
